message.raw:
Add pillow as dependency. It is used by labscript to convert marker colour
names to RGB values, and by a (as of yet unmerged) device, the LightCrafter DMD,
to produce BMP images from numpy arrays.

It will already be present on most anaconda installs.

It will already be present on most anaconda installs.
